synopsis.p: Read documents and entities in the PESV format.

description.p: reads CSV files in docStream and creates one document for each record. The identifier of the document is the id column. The section content is created from the tokenization provided in the processed_text column. The tokenization itself is recorded in the layer named after tokenLayerName.

also reads CSV files in entitiesStream and creates one entity annotation in the layer named entityLayerName for each record. All properties are recorded in the corresponding feature, as well as in a single feature names propertiesFeatureKey.

param-doc.name: docStream
param-doc.p: Path to the file(s) or directory(ies) where to look for document files.

param-doc.name: entitiesStream
param-doc.p: Path to the file(s) or directory(ies) where to look for entities files.

param-doc.name: entityLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to create entities.

param-doc.name: ordFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to record the token ordinal.

param-doc.name: propertiesFeature
param-doc.p: Name of the feature where to record entities properties. also records each property in a separate feature.

param-doc.name: tokenLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer where to create tokens.
